name: BOX YOU
description:
BOX YOU

My first attempt in making a game using C# language and Unity engine, hopefully the first of many.

Let me know what you think and share my Box with your friends.

 

DESCRIPTION

A short runner game with 3 levels (Easy, Medium, Hard). Complete the entire course while avoiding the obstacles blocking your way.

A special gift is waiting for you at the end of the game. You don’t wanna miss this out.

CONTROLS

Navigate through the course moving left and right using “A” and “D” on your keyboard.

 

CREDITS

Prod. Riddiman – for the beautiful beat

Brackeys – for being awesome

 

FUTURE UPDATES

Add more characters to play with.

Add more levels and integrate random spawning.

Add life system.

And add more special gifts, I mean who doesn’t like gifts.

Make a mobile version of this game.
